title.rendered: Budget 2023: Growth & manufacturing focus within fiscal consolidation theme

content.rendered:
Echoing Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman’s statement that India’s fiscal 2024 budget will follow the spirit of the earlier ones, economists expect it to be a pragmatic, rather than a populist, budget, even though this is the last full budget before the 2024 general elections.

India’s budget is likely to continue to focus on capital expenditure as a growth driver and give an impetus to manufacturing while continuing with the post-pandemic fiscal consolidation, Kirtika Suneja & Yog .

Source : https://tinyurl.com/yc5vr7hp
